alertInfoCreate: Invoices with complete information: Address, Full Legal Name, and TAX ID (NO P.O. BOX).
No discounts that will ultimately not be applicable.
It is important to review BEFORE sending. If submitted with any of the above issues, the entry will be removed to avoid import delays.

alerts.txtCheckClassifyProductText: This product does not yet have a review or rating.
alerts.txtRemoveProductMsg: This action will remove the product from the list. Do you want to continue?
alerts.txtDeleteProductMsg: The product has been successfully deleted.
alerts.txtEditWarningMsg: You cannot perform this action while there are products in edit mode. Save or confirm the changes first.
alerts.txtReturnWarningMsg: If you leave, you might lose unsaved changes.
alerts.txtFinishClassifyMsg: This action will mark the entry as fully classified. It can only be done if the review has been completed.
alerts.txtFinishClassifyOkMsg: The classification was successfully marked as finished.
alerts.txtFinishClassifyWarningMsg: An error occurred while finishing. Check that all fields are closed and complete.
alerts.txtMarkreviewQuestionMsg: Once the review is completed, this entry will move to the next stage of the process.
alerts.txtMarkReviewOkMsg: The entry was successfully marked as reviewed. It will now move to the classification process.
alerts.txtMarkReviewWarningMsg: An error occurred while finishing. Verify that all fields are closed and complete.
alerts.txtFinalizeEntryMsg: This action will mark the entry as finished (status 'Finished').
alerts.txtFinalizeEntryOkMsg: The entry was marked as finished. No further modifications can be made.
alerts.txtFinalizeEntryWarningMsg: This action cannot be completed. Verify that all fields are closed and complete.
alerts.txtFinalizeEntryErrorMsg: A system error occurred. Verify that all fields are closed and complete.
alerts.txtFinalizeEntrySysMsg: A system error occurred. Please notify and contact support.
